alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Garfield; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 4:58PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Phillips, northeastern Garfield and western Valley Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking multiple strong thunderstorms 22 miles north of Fourchette, or 22 miles south of Malta, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malta, Saco, The Pines Rec Area, Fourchette, Hinsdale, Vandalia, Sleeping Buffalo, Content, Sun Prairie, The Bentonite Plant and Bowdoin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
